errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependency installation step that conflicts with Red-DiscordBot's existing environment
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install command as Red-DiscordBot already manages its dependencies
Replace with `[p]pipinstall discord.py aiohttp requests` command instead
Move the dependency installation to after the repo add command
Change to `conda install discord.py aiohttp requests` for better package management
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install command as Red-DiscordBot already manages its dependencies
